name: teams_get_squad
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool divanscore.
Tool description: The most powerful sports API for live scores and football scores, results and stats. And not just football â€“ choose from more than 20+ sports, 5000+ leagues and tournaments, millions of events and many esports competitions. Analyze almost any live score and statistics on the planet ... This API helps to create a sporting site/application
API description: Retrieves the squad information for a specific team based on the given team ID.

teamid.description: The ID of the team. This value is typically obtained from the 'id' field returned in various API endpoints such as /teams/search, /matches/detail, /tournaments/get-featured-events, /tournaments/get-scheduled-events, or /tournaments/get-top-teams.
